Before I could do anything though, Billy was already tugging me out into the evening again. I thought about resisting. About going back inside for the gun but it wasn’t worth the effort. I could still slit my wrists or something.

A man stepped out of the shadows between the buildings across the street and headed towards us. No. Not a man, a monster. Four waving tentacles and a bulbous octopus head. Sickly orange skin and three eyes over a vicious looking beak of a mouth. The eyes to the left and right were cat eye green while the one in the middle was an almost neon yellow. Billy stepped in front of me as if to protect me. I didn’t want protecting though, I wanted to die. This creature looked like it could accomplish that for me. But there was something familiar about this creature. Was it the eyes?

“Anna. It’s me. It’s time to go home now. It’s time for the dream to end. You don’t have to suffer anymore.”

“Ge-get back you freak! Stay away from my sister!”

That voice. It was different, but at the same time I knew it. It was Chris’ voice. No. that wasn’t it. There was something more. A long forgotten memory. Brown eyes intruded upon my mind. A voice singing a song. People cheering to that song. The words began to pop into my head as those brown eyes haunted me. A thousand words, I have never spoken. A thousand thoughts, I want to share with you

A name popped into my mind to go along with the eyes and the words. Renna. That one word began a cascade of memories that threatened to overwhelm me. I looked at the monster in front of me again as if coming out of a dream. No. Not a monster, a Jarlepian. An alien species from a planet called Jrlp. And this was one that I knew very well. It was one that I loved.

“C-Chris…Cri’sa?”

He dipped his head in a nod before lifting one of his tentacles and laying it against the right side of my face. It had been a long time since I had felt this touch. I let my eyes close slightly as my throat tightened up.

“It’s me. And you’re finally back. Now we need to leave before this world restarts. We can explain things later.”

“B-but…”

“Later.”

His arm dropped as uncle Chris stepped out of the shadows between the buildings as well. I took a small step back in fright. Was he going to kill me now? I didn’t want that. I hadn’t told him I was sorry. I had done such horrible things to his daughter Renna. Uncle Chris played with something in his hand and a giant rip opened in the fabric of the world right next to them. Cri’sa held out his hand to me again clacking his beak in the Jarlepian version of a smile.

“Come with me Anna. Let me take you out of here. Let’s really live our lives this time.”

I hesitated. Not because I didn’t want to or didn’t believe him, but because I didn’t know what I was going to say to Renna or my mother or all the people I had hurt. Finally I reached out and took the offered tentacle. I might not know what I was going to say but I would be with Cri’sa again. That was all that mattered right now.

“So now you know the truth. Our story comes to an end. Well at least Chelsea, or should I say Anna’s story in this Anime Reality finally comes to a close after almost sixty cycles. Her and Cri’sa were interesting characters to watch while it lasted for every one of those cycles. Always something new with them.”

“Oh I knew this is how it would all end. I tried to stop you from seeing this though. Not because I didn’t want you to know, but because I didn’t want our time together to end. Our world is going to reset soon and go back to the way it is supposed to play out. Just like it does every twenty four episodes. But I really was bored and lonely. I always am. I’m the only one who ever remembers any of the things that go on. I lost track of how long it has been. Forty, fifty thousand times or more? How many years is that outside of this reality in the real world? The world where we are just figments of someone’s imagination.”

“Will you come with me back to the beginning? Not like you normally do where you forget all about our world. But with your memories intact. Will you spend a little more time with me as we replay these lives over again? Perhaps this time you can follow someone else and learn more about these people and their story. See just how everything is interconnected. I’d like that. I’d like that a lot.”

“The choice is yours.”

132.title: God is in Chris

info.brief_description: God is bored. So he gave you a portion of his power to watch the world in his place.
info.description:
I am god. I am not a god, or a false god, but the God. There are other gods in the world but none are as powerful as I am. That is because I created all the other gods in my boredom. I bestowed upon them a fragment of my power to play with as they would. Some became benign benefactors, others evil tyrants. I created a world for these my children to play with. To test their powers and eventually fight each other in their own boredom.

But such distractions can only entertain so long. One of my sons came to me with an idea. A diversion for all of our boredom. A world, populated with creatures without godhood. But with the potential for great things. Even the potential to become demi-gods themselves. They would be given free will, to chose the course of their own destiny. We gods would all simply observe these creatures that would be dubbed mortals.

It was left up to me to create these things. For I was the only one with the power to create. I did not give this ability to any of my sons and daughters. For I knew what use they might put it to. And so I created the world in a manner that was pleasing to me. I populated it with creatures that walked on two and four legs. My children were given the honor of naming all these animals and plants, though one creature in particular I named myself. Human.

Time passed as it always does, even for a god. These humans which I had created provided us with no end of amusement. Sometimes we would reveal ourselves to them and be worshiped for a time. Sometimes we nudged them into actions and situations they would not otherwise be in simply because we desired to do so. We watched as they evolved and became more of an individual with each passing era.

My sons and daughters became attached to this world I had created. Drawing power from aspects of it and changing their form to that of beasts. Legends sprang up about them, the nine tailed fox spirit. The vampire, werewolf, angels and demons. Creatures of good and bad that continued to pop up throughout what humans called history. And still I simply sat and observed from on high as was my way.

As is with anything, my immortal children grew bored and decided the indirect interference was not enough. The agreement that they would not get directly involved with this world was broken. First one and then another began to walk among the humans, mating with them and greatly altering the course of their lives more then the little nudges of the past. Blackening the hearts of these mortals a deeper shade then they had already been. Tainting them forever with malice.

More time passed and the immortal blood of my children coursed in the veins of humans, granting them special powers and abilities. A great war eventually broke out as my children became divided, using these mortals as pawn in their clashing. I saw that the world would be destroyed and the humans I had created would be wiped out and so I acted. I entered the fray and defeated every one of my children. For the first time since I had created them eons upon eons ago, I had raised my hand against them.

Many I stripped of their power of immortality, others I reabsorbed for their deeds. Only a few did I spare. Those who begged and pleaded for their lives and those who had not taken part in the war of their brothers. The humans I left to their own devices as it was meant to be. The blood of the gods still coursing in their veins. Years diluted these skills that had created great heroes. And we gods were mostly forgotten . Becoming little more than a memory.

But now I am bored again. Eternity is not an easy thing. Not when you can look upon the world and the animals you created and know what every one of them is thinking. See what is happening everywhere in the world with but a thought. Those of my children that survived my wrath are bound not to interfere with this world. Bound by my power. I could destroy it with but a thought, but I will not. They are all alive. They should not die simply because they no longer entertain.

And yet though I cannot see far into the future, no matter how all powerful humans think me, I can still see the state of the world today. The thought of whether humans deserve to live keeps worming its way into my mind. The malice and evil my children tainted their hearts with so long ago has grown infinitely worse. But should they be destroyed for what was done to them by my children? If that is so then am I not ultimately to blame for it all? For creating my children and giving them power. For creating this world and populating it? For simply observing for as long as I did?

This I have no answer to. As all powerful and all knowing as I am, still I do not know. That is why I have brought you here. You will observe with me. I will bestow upon you a portion of my powers. That is, the ability to hear everyone’s thoughts and see multiple places at once. You are mortal. You are already biased in your decision true, but as I said, I am bored. Perhaps if you see and hear what I hear you shall change your mind. And perhaps sitting up here on high for so long has biased me as well. So I will take over your body while you sit up here in my place and live the life of a human. I shall see the world first hand.

But that would not be very entertaining would it? So I will temporarily block the knowledge of what you look like from your mind. I will create a mystery for you to solve. Will you be able to find me I wonder? While listening to the billions of mind will you be able to point me out? A little game of cat and mouse. I shall be the mouse and you the cat. If you can figure out who I am before the time is up I shall grant you a wish. Any wish at all. Immortality, money, power. Name it and it is yours. But fail and I shall kill you.

I’m just joking! Don’t act so shocked. I am not that kind of god. First and foremost I simply observe. But in a game like this there must be a consequence for losing. Is that not how such things are handled? The sense of urgency and the urge to win is not there if there is not a negative action to balance the reward. So what shall it be? Ah I know! I shall wipe your memories at the end of every day when you get your body back. Your friends will become strangers to you every morning. That would be quite amusing to watch for a while.

Now that the rules are set and the stakes stated, let us commence with our little game shall we?

To enlighten you on things you don’t understand and try to help you keep all the voices and places straight so your mortal mind does not explode. But I won’t give away who I am. Too bad for you. You’ve got to solve this mystery the old fashioned way. Ok this time for real we shall start this adventure.
